attributes.action: implement urgently a judicial review of Lance Bombadier Ben Parkinson's compensation award and also the associated Armed Services Compensation Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that a judicial review is necessary as the military covenant is not being upheld with regards to seriously injured military personnel.  The Ministry of Defence is repeatedly failing in its Duty of Care to service personnel.  

It is vital that the revised scheme takes into account ALL injuries and the ongoing/future medical and care needs of injured military personnel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
